name: Celestial Conflict
description:
Celestial Conflict is a 2D arcade twin-stick shooter with stacking powerups and a handful of different weapons.  Aim for a high score!

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Mouse Left Click - Shoot
  • Mouse Right Click - Bomb
Credits
  • Made in GameMaker Studio 2
  • Programming & Art by Thetha
  • Pixel Space Background Generator by Deep-Fold
  • Icons by various authors on Game-icons.net under CC BY 3.0
  • Music from Sci-Fi Space Shooter GameMaker Asset Bundle
  • Sounds generated from Bfxr
  • Font 'Retro Gaming' by Daymarius
